Nasereddine Souïdi (Arabic:  الدينيدي سو, amụrụ na 30 Nọvemba 1969), nke a maara dị ka Cheb Nasro na Nasro bụ onye na-agu egwu raï kachasị mma onye nwere ihe karịrị abọm otu narị na iri atọ na otu. Nasro edekọla egwu nke gụnyere "Ndirek Amour" (M na-ahọrọ gị Ịhụnanya m) "Ma Rkhalinich" (Ahapụla M) na "Enfin Enfin" (n'ikpeazụ)
Ọ bụ naanị onye na-agu egwu Raï bịanyere aka na ụlọ ọrụ egwu America, Miles Copeland ARK21/Mondo Melodia.

A mụrụ Nasro Nasereddine Souidi na 30 Nọvemba 1969 na Aïn Témouchent o wee too n'obodo ọdịda anyanwụ Algeria nke Oran. Oge izizi ya na egwu bịara mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ mgbe nwanne nna ya zụtara ya drabouka (ịgba omenala)

Mgbe ọ bụ nwata, ọ na-esokarị Cheb Zahounie agbamakwụkwọ na-eme ka ọ pụta ìhè mbụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa na ụlọ ọgbakọ Nasro dị n'ógbè ahụ nwetara nkwanye ùgwù ma kpọọ ya òkù ka ọ bụrụ ihe ngosi kwa ụbọchị site na elekere nke ato nke ụtụtụ ruo elekere nke anọ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ
N'ime otu afọ, o dekọrọ abọm mbụ ya wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na Europe dum
N'agbanyeghị asọmpi, Nasro na Cheb Hasni ghọrọ ezigbo enyi

Olileanya nke Nasro n'oge ọrụ malitere ịla n'iyi mgbe e gbuchara Cheb Hasni na September 29, 1994, mgbe ọtụtụ ndị na-agu egwu raï kwagara Europe ma ọ bụ North America, ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ ole na ole gara n'ihu na-abụ abụ n'ala nna ya
O mechara kwuo, sị: “Enwere m anụ ahụ́ nke ukwuu n’ihi nchegbu wee na-agagharị ọtụtụ ebe"
